alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Caldwell; Comal; Guadalupe; Hays; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 12:14AM CDT until June 03 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CALDWELL...SOUTHERN HAYS...GUADALUPE...NORTHWESTERN WILSON...BEXAR AND COMAL COUNTIES... At 1213 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Twin Sisters to Garden Ridge to Somerset, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, New Braunfels, San Marcos, Schertz, Kyle, Seguin, Cibolo, Universal City, Live Oak, Buda, Selma, Floresville, Wimberley, San Antonio Int Airport, Randolph AFB, Canyon Lake Dam, Stinson Municipal Airport, Canyon Lake, Leon Valley and Helotes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bexar; Caldwell; Comal; Guadalupe; Hays; Wilson
